title: Quarkus security releases for CVE-2023-4853
content: We have just released updates to Quarkus 2.16.11.Final, 3.2.6.Final, and 3.3.3 and Red Hat build of Quarkus 2.13.18.SP2 that fix the issue reported in CVE-2023-4853. This issue affects anyone using HTTP security path-based rules to protect HTTP endpoints. Recommendations If you are using any older versions of Quarkus (ranging from...
